output_list.criticism: The mintToken function has an integer overflow, allowing the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The setPrices function has a permission set for the owner, allowing the owner to restrict the access of the function.
The sell function has an integer overflow, allowing the owner to set the balance of the user's assets to any value.
The mintToken function has multiple assets, allowing the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The setPrices function has multiple assets, allowing the owner to set the balance of the contract to any value.
The sell function has multiple assets, allowing the owner to set the balance of the user's assets to any value.
The mintToken function has a typo constructor, allowing the owner to set the balance of the user's assets to any value.
The setPrices function has a typo constructor, allowing the owner to set the balance of the contract to any value.
The sell function has a typo constructor, allowing the owner to set the balance of the user's assets to any value.
